snippet: The country’s military said that Adnan G. el-Shukrijumah, who was in charge of all external operations for Al Qaeda, was killed during an intelligence operation.
abstract: Pakistani military kills Adnan G el-Shukrijumah, senior leader of Al Qaeda who was wanted in United States on charges of plotting to bomb several Western targets; death marks major counterrorism victory for Pakistan military, and is likely to further improve fraught relations with US.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from London, and Salman Masood from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The country’s military said that Adnan G. el-Shukrijumah, who was in charge of all external operations for Al Qaeda, was killed during an intelligence operation.

headline.main: Pakistani Military Kills a Qaeda Leader
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Military Kills a Senior Qaeda Leader
